fields.headline: Run that up the mast
fields.bodyText: You report (Briton fined for 'desecrating' US flag, May 19) that American security police "became distressed" by the sight of an American flag bearing the slogan Stop Star Wars. The poor dears. Have they been offered counselling? Susan Kellerman Leeds s.kellerman@leeds.ac.uk  I'm confused. I thought that Ian Paisley and his fellow Free Presbyterians championed the traditional rights of people to walk through the streets in lines while accompanied by funny music (Letters, May 19). After all, the line dancing season is nearly upon us. Toby Wood Peterborough TobyWood@compuserve.com
